Title: Delicate Rose : A 50ml Pack of Long-Lasting, Lingering & Enchanting Women's Perfume
Description:
Delicate Rose- a magical potion of floral fragrance, citrus, and musky notes.
The softness of this composition unravels with white and Damascene rose, merging sensuously with the creamy sandal and sweet patchouli.
A refreshing fusion of Italian bergamot and tangy mandarin, accentuated by spicy pepper and green aromatic undertones of geranium.
White musk and Tonka beans add a layer of addictive softness to the most Delicate Rose.
Suitable for any occasion, casual or formal
High-quality women's fragrance
Experience the captivating beauty of Delicate Rose with Bryan & Candy Delicate Rose

Title: Illusion: A 50ml Pack of Long-Lasting, Lingering & Enchanting Women's Perfume
Description:
Illusion gradually unravels its mystical floral, fruity and musky layers adding an irresistible charm to the bearer’s beauty.
The marvellous melon and opulent orange teamed with the lilting lemon lend an alluring aura. Illusion encompasses the beauty of a floral bouquet: green lilies, powerful gardenia, lush magnolia, poised peonies and camellia blossoms.
Such a blooming fragrance is based on soft white musk notes, blending beautifully with warm amber, creamy sandal and earthy patchouli.

Title: Icandy Perfume (EDP) for Women - 50ml : Long-Lasting, Lingering & Enchanting Women's Fragrance with an Oriental Charm, Mesmerizing notes of  Almonds and Coffee
Description:
I Candy is a delectable fragrance with an oriental appeal.
The mesmerizing aroma of almonds and coffee mingles with lively and tantalizing spices. Enriching its charm is the jasmine sambac and hypnotic tuberose with an enthralling hint of appealing vanilla and deep amber.
The cocoa touch in its luscious base complements the organic character of woody vetiver and Tonka bean.
Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions
50ml bottle size is perfect for travel
cruelty-free, so you can feel good about using it.
50 ML Pack

Title: Enigma Perfume (EDP) for Women - 50ml : Long-Lasting, Lingering & Enchanting Women's Fragrance , Hypnotic notes of Magnolia and Violets
Description:
Enigma- a fragrant composition of fruity flavours and beautiful flowers.
Elegant bergamot and peach, the magnificent magnolia and vivacious violets together conjure up an exquisite fragrance of a forest nymphet.
The hypnotic charm of jasmine and tuberose alongside mesmerizing orchids add an oomph to the sensuality of plum.
It unfolds its layers of rapturous raspberry and captivating vanilla, followed by a veil of soft mosses.
Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions
50ml bottle size is perfect for travel
cruelty-free, so you can feel good about using it.
50 ML Pack

Title: Adore Women's Perfume (EDP) 25ml: A Long-lasting Lingering & Enchanting
Description:
Introducing Bryan & Candy Adore, a luxurious and long-lasting fragrance exclusively for women.
The scent provides a fresh and soothing aroma that lasts up to 12 hours.
Perfect for daily wear or special occasions, this Eau de Parfum is sure to become a favorite in your fragrance collection.
The elegant 25ml bottle is easy to use and perfect for carrying in your bag for touch-ups throughout the day.
Bryan & Candy Adore is cruelty-free and vegan, not only good for you but also for animals and the environment.
Indulge in the ultimate in luxury and sophistication with Bryan & Candy Adore, a fragrance that is made just for women and respect animal rights.

Title: Discover Women's Perfume Set | 4 Unique Scents
Description:
A set of 4 long-lasting and soothing fragrances curated for the modern woman
Includes four unique perfumes: Enigma, Delicate Rose, Icandy, and Illusion
Each perfume contains 8ml of fragrance
Provides a variety of fragrances to choose from, suitable for different moods and occasions
Enigma: a hypnotic blend of fruity flavors and floral elegance
Delicate Rose: a fresh and delicate rose fragrance with a modern twist
Icandy : a fruity and floral fragrance with a long-lasting and soothing effect
Illusion: a woody and musky fragrance with a hint of floral and fruity notes
Designed to evoke a sense of sophistication and elegance, with a modern touch
A great gift for a loved one or for treating yourself to a new fragrance experience.
